thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com | 2 of 95
thread.title: Adanah Davis
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Adanah Davis

author: Adanah Davis
title: Adanah Davis
text: I purchased my friend the gift set Sauvage for Christmas I received the box and the gift set was not there. I paid 118.00 for it. I contacted customer service several times the claims to get back with me but has not. It's March and I have not received my money back nor a replacement gift set. My experience with this company has been a nightmare.
